title: Baked salmon with crispy crumb crust
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '1/2 teaspoon garlic granules', 'salt and pepper to taste', '60g herb seasoned breadcrumbs', '2 tablespoons mayonnaise, or as needed', '1 teaspoon mustard powder', '2 salmon fillets (about 2.5cm thick)']
